products.name: Vivo
products.description: Products collected from customers who want to resell, collect old items, slight scratches on camera body/screen glass. Cable and charger included (Extra 200K discount if no accessories included). The machine may have been through manufacturer warranty or repaired and replaced components. Have clear origin, issue eVAT invoice.

products.name: Samsung Galay A25
products.description: Samsung Galaxy A23 5G was launched in early September 2022. This product has a large 6.6-inch LCD screen, finished with Gorilla Glass 5. The back and frame are both made of plastic. Unfortunately, the device does not have an IP rating against water or dust.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy A23
products.description: Samsung Galaxy A23 5G is a quite bright phone in the mid-range and low-cost segment. The product has a large, sharp display screen, strong performance, and stable battery life for long-term use.

products.name: iPhone 15 Pro Max (256GB)
products.description: iPhone 15 Pro Max was officially launched at the Wonderlust event at Steve Jobs Theater, California (USA) at 10:00 am on September 12, or 0:00 on September 13 (Vietnam time). The new iPhone in the new series gives users a more stable experience with the latest generation of A17 Pro chip, along with Wi-Fi 6E technology. The camera set of iPhone 15 Pro Max is also upgraded with a telephoto lens with 5x optical zoom capability with a modern tetraprism design.

products.name: iPhone 14 Plus (256GB)
products.description: iPhone 14 Plus is a mini replacement version of the iPhone 14 Series generation, which Apple introduced on the iPhone 12 and 13 series generations, to avoid confusion with the Pro Max line. This is a cheaper version of the iPhone 14 Pro Max, with a sophisticated design with impressive camera upgrades and groundbreaking new safety capabilities.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy A55 - 8GB/128GB
products.description: Own the Samsung Galaxy A55 now - Genuine, classy for every experience with a luxurious metal frame, creating a trendy style for users. Impressive rear camera system with sharp 50MP main camera, 12MP super wide-angle camera that covers every scene, 5MP macro camera to explore the microscopic world and 32MP front camera for sparkling selfies. Powerful performance thanks to the 8-core Exynos 1480 chip, alongside the Super AMOLED screen with Full HD + 1080 x 2400 resolution for the ultimate entertainment experience. Finally, the battery capacity is large up to 5000mAh for comfortable use all day long.

products.name: iPhone 15 (128GB)
products.description: At dawn on September 13 Vietnam time, iPhone 15 was launched along with other products in the series. This phone is equipped with a powerful Apple A16 Bionic chip and a 5-core graphics GPU. The device also has a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR OLED screen for brilliant display quality, a 48MP (main) and 12MP (super wide angle) camera system and 4K video recording ability. Besides, Apple has abandoned the Lightning port on iPhone 15 and replaced it with a USB Type-C port.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy A35 - 8GB/128GB
products.description: Samsung Galaxy A35 - Genuine brings trendy style with a satisfying experience for users. This smartphone is equipped with an Exynos 1380 processor, providing effective multitasking capabilities and powerful performance. The included Mali-G68 MP5 GPU chip will enhance the device's graphics capabilities, helping tasks to be handled smoothly. Users will admire sharp images on the large 6.6-inch Super AMOLED screen, capture every vivid moment with the 50MP rear camera and experience seamlessly all day long with a 5000mAh battery capacity.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy S24 Plus - 12GB/512GB
products.description: Samsung Galaxy S24 Plus - Genuine phone is equipped with Exynos 2400 for Galaxy chipset, ensuring strong and stable performance. Besides, with a 6.7 inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X QHD+ screen and 120Hz refresh rate, S24 Plus promises to bring a smooth and vivid movie watching and gaming experience. The phone's main camera is up to 50MP, along with a 12MP front camera, optimized for high-quality photography and video recording. In addition, the device's battery has a capacity of 4,900 mAh, enough to play games and surf the web all day without worrying about running out of battery.

products.name: Laptop ASUS Vivobook 14 X1404ZA-NK389W (I7-1255U/16GB/512GB PCIE/14.0 FHD/WIN11)
products.description: ASUS Vivobook 14 X1404ZA-NK389W laptop is an office laptop in ASUS's Vivobook product line. The device offers a series of outstanding advantages to support users in daily tasks. These include a large 14-inch screen that comfortably displays images and content or modern LED Backlit technology with a brightness of 250 nits. In addition, the internal configuration uses the power of the latest generation Intel Core i7-1255U processor, helping to handle basic to advanced tasks well. The device also has an integrated Intel Iris Xe Graphics card, providing excellent graphics performance for work and entertainment.

products.name: Laptop Lenovo IdeaPad 5 14IAL7 82SD006PVN (i5-1235U/8GB/512GB/Intel Iris Xe/14 inch FHD/Win 11)
products.description: Lenovo IdeaPad 5 14IAL7 82SD006PVN is the perfect laptop model for office tasks. The device owns Intel Core i5-1235U, providing stable multitasking capabilities. 8GB RAM and 512GB SSD help increase processing speed, providing effective data storage space. The standard 14-inch IPS screen provides quality display space with Full HD 1920x1080 resolution. In addition, the device also supports a 1080p FHD camera, a 56.6Wh battery for extended use and convenient connection ports.

products.name: ASUS TUF Gaming A15 FA506NF-HN005W (Core Ultra 9 185H/32GB/1TB/Intel Arc/14 3K OLED 120Hz/Windows 11)
products.description: ASUS TUF Gaming A15 FA506NF-HN005W Laptop is a high-end gaming laptop product line from the ASUS brand. When using this product, users will have the opportunity to experience impressive convergence of technologies, with powerful performance that can confidently handle all tasks from difficult to easy. ASUS TUF Gaming A15 FA506NF-HN005W laptop is powered by a high-end AMD Ryzen 5 7535HS processor. FHD screen (1920x1080) with super smooth refresh rate up to 144Hz, combined with NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2050 graphics card to comfortably 'fight' great thrilling games. Large storage capacity with 8GB RAM and 512GB SSD hard drive to download all your favorite games. For those who are looking for a high-configuration gaming laptop, this will definitely be an extremely ideal choice.

products.name: Laptop LG Gram 2022 16ZD90Q-G.AX51A5D i5-1240P/8GB/256GB/Intel Iris Xe Graphics/16' WQXGA/DOS
products.description: If you are looking for a laptop model that must have a beautiful and compact design, along with ensuring performance, then the LG Gram 2022 16ZD90Q-G.AX51A5D is the laptop model for you. . So what outstanding advantages does this LG Gram laptop have? Let's find out with Hoang Ha Mobile. Impressive ultra-thin design The first impression of this LG Gram 2022 16ZD90Q-G.AX51A5D as soon as you look at it will definitely be its modern design and extremely thin and light size. Specifically, the overall dimensions of the device are only 354.5 x 242.1 x 16.8 mm and weight is only 1,199kg. Combined with the main color tone of white, it further highlights the luxurious and classy beauty of this laptop model. Therefore, right from its launch, LG Gram 2022 16ZD90Q-G.AX51A5D has become an extremely hot item that has attracted a lot of attention from users who are office workers or successful businessmen.

products.name: Laptop Gaming Asus Rog Strix G15 G513RC HN038W - R7-6800H/8GB/512GB/4GB RTX3050/15.6 FHD/WIN11
products.description: Asus ROG Strix G15 G513RC HN038W Laptop is a gaming laptop from ASUS with an exterior design and internal performance that brings a different level compared to other gaming laptop models on the market. Along with the reasonable price for what the device offers, Asus ROG is definitely one of the gaming laptops for you. Asus ROG Strix G15 G513RC HN038W laptop possesses a gaming-like exterior design but is still extremely eye-catching and attractive, classy with strong black-gray tones. The machine is also completed by a hard, sturdy shell, but the total weight of the machine is very light, only 2.3kg and the entire machine's size is 35.4 x 25.9 x 2.26 ~ 2.72 cm. , very easy for users to hold and put in backpacks or briefcases to carry the device everywhere.

products.name: Laptop HP ProBook 450 G9-6M142PA- i5-1235U/8GB/256GB/13.3FHD/W11SL/LED_KB
products.description: HP ProBook 450 G9-6M103PA laptop has a trendy, modern and luxurious design, along with a powerful hardware configuration, providing a smooth usage experience. This will be the perfect laptop model for students or office workers with basic working and studying needs. HP ProBook 450 G9-6M103PA laptop is 'dressed' by the manufacturer with an appearance that can be said to be quite modern, unique and new, along with being equally sophisticated and luxurious. It's all thanks to the soft curved lines and the quality of the finished shell is also very sturdy and durable. In addition, the weight of the device is only 1.74kg, providing high mobility, allowing users to put the HP Probook in a backpack or briefcase and take it with them everywhere.

products.name: Laptop ASUS Gaming TUF Dash F15 FX517ZE-HN045W (i5-12450H/8GB/512GB/RTX 3050Ti 4GB/15.6' FHD/Win11)
products.description: The back of the device overall is designed quite simply. But thanks to the meticulous machining at the corners, the Asus Gaming TUF Dash F15 still shows the strength of a gaming laptop. If Asus used all metal materials to maintain the device's strong gaming style, the weight of the device would be quite heavy. However, with the use of metal on the back and plastic for the body, the weight of the laptop has been reduced, while still maintaining its sturdiness and durability. In addition, the price of the machine will also be reduced thanks to this adjustment to make the product more accessible to users.

products.name: Laptop Lenovo IdeaPad Gaming 3 15ACH6-82K2027QVN (Ryzen 5 5500H/8GB/512GB/RTX 2050/15.6' FHD 144Hz/Windows 11)
products.description: Lenovo IdeaPad Gaming 3 15ACH6-82K2027QVN laptop is a top-notch machine from Lenovo with a combination of powerful performance and sophisticated design. With the power from the Ryzen 5 5500H processor, 8GB RAM, 512GB SSD and top-notch RTX 2050 graphics card, this laptop is a powerful 'companion' for those who are passionate about gaming or doing casual graphics. trans. At the same time, when combined with an IPS panel, FULL HD with a frequency of 144Hz will make you quickly immerse yourself in a sharp, vivid space when playing games.

products.name: Laptop Lenovo IdeaPad 3 15ABA7-82RN006YVN- R7-5825U/8GB/512GB/15.6FHD/W11H
products.description: Lenovo IdeaPad 3 15ABA7-82RN006YVN laptop is a laptop equipped with a simple appearance with balanced borders, giving a luxurious feel, suitable for all types of users. Besides, Lenovo IdeaPad Laptop also has an extremely powerful configuration and the price is extremely competitive with competitors in the same range.

products.name: Laptop Acer Aspire 3 A315-58-52KT (NX.AM0SV.006)
products.description: Acer Aspire 3 A315-58-52KT Laptop: Brings many surprises in the mid-range segment. Acer's Aspire product line is aimed at general users, so laptops in this line always possess almost all the most necessary elements for users. With stable performance and extremely affordable price, Acer Aspire has become an extremely competitive name in this segment. Surely the Acer Aspire 3 A315-58-52KT Laptop will not be an exception to this product line. You will be completely surprised with what this laptop can bring with its extremely competitive price on the market.
